summary.para: Called when a composition is terminated.

param.name: ecWrite
param.para: Contains a TfEditCookie value that identifies the edit context. This is the same value passed for ecWrite in the call to .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: There is no required action for the TSF text service when this method is called. The TSF text service can use this notification to revert partially composed text into readable text or erase the composition entirely. The TSF manager will automatically clear the GUID_PROP_COMPOSING property value over the affected text.

summary.para: The ITfCompositionSink interface is implemented by a text service to receive a notification when a composition is terminated. This advise sink is installed by passing a pointer to this interface when the composition is started with the method.
